alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Onslow County through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dixon, or 8 miles northwest of North Topsail Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Folkstone and Sneads Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
